name: Blobber
description: Blobber is a physics-based 2D platformer where players must wrangle the gelatinous controls and behaviors of the game's protagonist to navigate effectively through procedurally generated environments, facing climbing puzzles, obstacles, and unfriendly denizens. Learn how to manipulate this little blob's physical properties to slink up walls, hang from ceilings, and deftly launch from surface to surface, achieving the goals of survival and progression.
